935199d changed from pose input to euler angles input

ed93346 changed from hardcoded string identifiers to requiring transform with examples for common transforms.

I don't have a good answer for using accelerometer. This seems like it would have to be a special tag that triggers some hardcoded behavior reading accelerometer state to compute an orientation. Assuming gravity direction dictates z-axis orientation, we still have to let user select how x and y-axis of the reference frame should be oriented. Any suggestions?
